dc_description_s: Lindsay Lake is located on the Pangman Tract (Concession 15, Lots 11-13 of South Frontenac Township, Frontenac County). Mean depth = 4.4 m; maximum depth = 10.9 m; surface area = 31.5 ha, shoreline = 2417.9 m. Lindsay Lake has one small inflowing creek at its north end. It is broadly connected to Poole Lake, through which it drains. Lindsay Lake's water eventually reaches drains to the Rideau Canal via a series of wetlands, creeks and lakes.
